member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Abstractions.DiamondCoreException
member.summary: This the base or all exceptions in the Diamond.Core library. This allows exceptions specific to this library to be caught separately than other exceptions.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Abstractions.DiamondCoreException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Abstractions.DiamondCoreException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Abstractions.DiamondCoreException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
